# draggingImageForItems(at:with:offset:)

**Instance Method**

This method computes and returns an image to use for dragging.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func draggingImageForItems(at indexes: IndexSet, with event: NSEvent, offset dragImageOffset: NSPointPointer) -> NSImage
```

## Parameters

- **indexes**: The index set of the items to be dragged.
- **event**: Mouse drag event.
- **dragImageOffset**: An in/out parameter that will initially be set to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSZeroPoint]. it can be modified to reposition the returned image. A `dragImageOffset` of [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSZeroPoint] will cause the image to be centered under the mouse.

## Return Value

An image containing a rendering of the visible portions of the views for each item.

## Discussion

You can override the default image by subclassing NSCollectionView and overriding this method, or by implementing the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSCollectionViewDelegate/collectionView(_:draggingImageForItemsAt:with:offset:)-4yvk5] delegate method, it will be preferred over this method.

## Legacy Collection View Support

- **itemPrototype**: The receiver’s collection view item prototype.
- **newItem(forRepresentedObject:)**: Returns the collection view item that is used for the specified object.
- **selectionIndexes**: The indexes of the currently selected items.
- **maxNumberOfRows**: The maximum number of rows that the collection view displays.
- **maxNumberOfColumns**: The maximum number of columns that the collection view displays.
- **minItemSize**: The minimum size (in points) of items in the collection view grid.
- **maxItemSize**: The maximum size (in points) of items in the collection view grid.
- **item(at:)**: Returns the collection view item for the represented object at the specified index.
- **frameForItem(at:)**: Returns the frame of the collection view item at the specified index.
- **frameForItem(at:withNumberOfItems:)**: Returns the frame of an item based on the number of items in the collection view.
- **setDraggingSourceOperationMask(_:forLocal:)**: Configures the drag operation mask.
